query:
SELECT r.nomeLoja, r.lojaId, l.nome as lojaBD
FROM relatorios_analise_loja r
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON r.lojaId = l.id
WHERE r.analiseId = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM analises_fichas_servico)
AND r.lojaId IN (
  SELECT l.id FROM users u
  JOIN gestores g ON u.id = g.userId
  JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId
  JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
  WHERE u.name LIKE '%Carlos Eduardo%'
)
ORDER BY r.nomeLoja;
